verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I’m a child of the King,
A child of the King:
With Jesus my Saviour
I’m a child of the King.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
My Father is rich
in house and lands,
He holdeth the wealth
of the world in His hands!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Of rubies and diamonds,
of silver and gold,
His coffers are full,
He has riches untold.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
My Father’s own Son,
the Saviour of men,
Once wandered on earth
as the poorest of them;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
But now He is pleading
our pardon on high,
That we may be His
when He comes by and by.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
I once was an outcast
stranger one earth,
A sinner by choice,
and an alien by birth;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
But I’ve been adopted,
My name’s written down,
An heir to a mansion,
a robe, and a crown.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
A tent or a cottage,
why should I care?
They’re building a palace
for me over there;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Tho’ exiled from home,
yet, still I may sing:
All glory to God,
I’m a child of the King.
